Author: Leighton129
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: ICO tokens will be treated as a commodity in US. Now, the witnesses proposed that a digital token’s legal status is in fact fluid: when it is marketed at a “pre-functional” moment in its development — i.e. during an Initial Coin Offering (ICO) — then the sale at that moment is an investment contract and thus a security, lying in the legal field overviewed by the SEC. Further, when crypto tokens are realized and become used in a decentralized network a commodity becomes relevant to the CFTC. That could settle the Ethereum dilemma: last spring, the token was rumoured to be classified as a security. However, in that case its ICO that was held years prior to that would be deemed illegal (as it was not registered with the SEC at the time), and therefore the whole asset would become compromised, a scenario Gensler deemed dangerous for the industry.

Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: I get information that LocalCoinSwap will launch two exciting new concepts: LocalCoinSwap platform, and ICO Cryptoshare. The goal is because there is no exchange whatsoever that serves the needs of LocalCoinSwap. And LocalCoinSwap will do it in two ways.  First, LocalCoinSwap builds a peer-to-peer exchange that supports every cryptocurrency and every possible payment method.  Secondly, LocalCoinSwap are decentralizing the most important part of the exchange: the profits!. But the profits is not the only thing that LocalCoinSwap decentralizes. LocalCoinSwap also decentralizes the company's internal decision-making and business direction with a proof-of-stake voting system.

Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops

Experts predict an extraordinary interest in LCS Cryptoshares, which will allow to collect large investments at the stage of ICO.  The platform offers extremely low costs for traders. Since peer-to-peer transactions are supported, the parties will not have to pay for the services of the intermediary. Interesting solutions are democratic governance and constant profit for holders and users.

Author: mossdj
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: I should admit that project on paper is appealing, but I am concerned about escrow system as far as I know.  Let me explain, I have been watching another interesting project such as Payfair that is very similar to this one. The idea is great, but after some weeks in Payfair escrow platform, the system is simply inefficient. Individual transactions without automated IT exchange solutions depends heavily on people being using their accounts, what could delay for some days just a single transaction.  Devs have to ensure updated info on exchange transactions in order to gain attention from market. I would like to listen from them how they will solve this situation. An exchange without any information on bid/ask simply wont be trusted and that’s something they should ensure.  If they offer an escrow ecosystem working similar to Binance or Coinbase platform I will invest heavily, but relying on people will always lack of volume to make the project profitable. It’s just a constructive critic, I wish all th best to project, the world needs reliable crypto-flat exchanges.

Author: Seidr
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: Profits from the exchange are calculated and distributed at the end of each fiscal period. The total issuance of dividend and voting tokens will be the same as the total supply of LCS Cryptoshares. These tokens are then issued to holders of LCS Cryptoshares on a 1-to-1 ratio.

Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LocalCoinSwap will launch with as many of the most traded cryptocurrencies as development time allows. The initial launch aims for a minimum of the leading 10 cryptocurrencies. The platform will add new cryptocurrencies at a constant rate in order to encompass the majority of the cryptocurrency market.   Payment currencies ETH, BTC, USDT, BCH, XRP, USD, EUR, GBP, AUD, NZD, CAD & more

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops

Author: Seidr
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LocalCoinSwap provides a listing service for new ICO tokens to allow them to launch on the LocalCoinSwap platform or raise pre-ICO and presale funding. The requirement for listing new ICO tokens is that holders of LCS Cryptoshares receive an airdrop of some proportion of the new tokens in advance. These airdrops are automatically distributed through the same mechanism as the dividend and voting tokens. The specific requirements for new ICO tokens to list on the LocalCoinSwap platform will be decided through the proof-of-stake voting system.

Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops

Author: Seidr
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LocalCoinSwap (LCS) is a decentralised marketplace which allows buyers and sellers to trade directly in any cryptocurrency using any method of payment. LocalCoinSwap provides a safe, uncomplicated and fast peer-to-peer (P2P) trading platform, allowing users to freely exchange without unnecessary verification requirements or waiting times. The platform utilises a secure escrow system that solves the inherent trust issues of online P2P trading.

Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LocalCoinSwap represents a return to the most fundamental system of asset exchange without reliance on mainstream institutions - the P2P trade. By enabling P2P trading of all digital currencies LocalCoinSwap will put the market back into the hands of its users, allowing them to directly trade any cryptocurrency using any conceivable payment method in any geographical location.

Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LCS Cryptoshares are not like traditional ICO tokens. Instead of a vague promise of possible future returns or idealistic visions which may never eventuate into product, Cryptoshares entitle the holders to guaranteed rights to 100% of the total profits from the Localcoinswap exchange through cryptocurrency dividends.

Author: Silkcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops

Author: yuansuyi
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LCS Cryptoshares entitle the holder to voting rights in the platform’s decisionmaking process, such as the listing of new tokens on the exchange, the direction of new business ventures and design considerations or functionalities for the platform.

Author: Silkcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops

Author: yuansuyi
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: Profits from the exchange are calculated and distributed at the end of each fiscal period. The total issuance of dividend and voting tokens will be the same as the total supply of LCS Cryptoshares. These tokens are then issued to holders of LCS Cryptoshares on a 1-to-1 ratio

Author: ModusPwnd
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LocalCoinSwap was started by a team of qualified cryptocurrency experts and enthusiasts frustrated by their inability to quickly or easily buy and sell new digital assets. While plenty of mechanisms exist to purchase cryptocurrencies with other cryptocurrencies, there is little support for those who wish to enter the market with fiat currency and quickly purchase using a variety of traditional payment methods. The idea for LocalCoinSwap was born from our own needs and wants. Together our team draws on a wealth of experience from a wide range of fields, including Economics, Computer Science, Commerce, Marketing, Maths & even Molecular Genetics

Author: yuansuyi
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: Since Bitcoin’s inception in 2009, P2P exchanges have been a key instrument in its dissemination and popularity. Trade volume for Bitcoin has increased exponentially alongside the overall cryptocurrency economy. The week starting 23rd of December 2017 saw over 130 million ($130,000,000 ) USD worth of Bitcoin change hands via Localbitcoins.com – comprising the largest week of P2P trade in Bitcoin’s history. LocalBitcoins.com currently hold the title of the world’s largest P2P Bitcoin exchange. LocalBitcoins.com has no plans as of writing to support additional cryptocurrencies.

A dividend per $1 USD invested of $49.62 in 2022 still requires the total revenue of LocalCoinSwap to be less than half of the current revenue of some of the top exchanges in 2018. A poorer outcome scenario of $0.34 annual dividends per $1 USD invested only requires LocalCoinSwap to capture a small fraction of the current market share for any of the leading 10 cryptocurrencies.  2019 $0.34 2020 $1.96 2021 $9.83 2022 $49.62

Author: Seidr
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LocalCoinSwap represents a return to the most fundamental system of asset exchange without reliance on mainstream institutions - the P2P trade. By enabling P2P trading of all digital currencies LocalCoinSwap will put the market back into the hands of its users, allowing them to directly trade any cryptocurrency using any conceivable payment method in any geographical location.

Author: zhaojundong
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: thanks for the answer))   Tell me please about the tokens What are tokens?

Author: Seidr
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LCS Cryptoshares are not like traditional ICO tokens. Instead of a vague promise of possible future returns or idealistic visions which may never eventuate into product, Cryptoshares entitle the holders to guaranteed rights to 100% of the total profits from the Localcoinswap exchange through cryptocurrency dividends.

Author: zhaojundong
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: I want to participate in your project)) What rights will I have?

Author: Seidr
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LCS Cryptoshares entitle the holder to voting rights in the platform’s decisionmaking process, such as the listing of new tokens on the exchange, the direction of new business ventures and design considerations or functionalities for the platform.

Author: zhaojundong
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: Wow!)) cool))) I like it)) How is the profit calculated?   What is the volume of voting tokens?

Author: Seidr
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: Profits from the exchange are calculated and distributed at the end of each fiscal period. The total issuance of dividend and voting tokens will be the same as the total supply of LCS Cryptoshares. These tokens are then issued to holders of LCS Cryptoshares on a 1-to-1 ratio

Author: mine777
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: Sorry, but it is the best way to explain it to u:  LocalCoinSwap provides a listing service for new ICO tokens to allow them to launch on the LocalCoinSwap platform or raise pre-ICO and presale funding. The requirement for listing new ICO tokens is that holders of LCS Cryptoshares receive an airdrop of some proportion of the new tokens in advance. These airdrops are automatically distributed through the same mechanism as the dividend and voting tokens. The specific requirements for new ICO tokens to list on the LocalCoinSwap platform will be decided through the proof-of-stake voting system. The requirement for new ICO tokens wishing to raise pre-ICO funding is that LocalCoinSwap users and Cryptoshare holders must be entitled to special discount offerings. The expansion of LocalCoinSwap to provide a comprehensive listing service for new ventures to perform pre-ICO, presale and ICO is a fundamental priority for the platforms development after initial launch.

Author: redlay
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: The platform implements a novel approach to traditional company ownership by utilising blockchain technology to distribute the entirety of the sites profits to holders of LCS Cryptoshares. This asset entitles investors to regular dividend payments denominated in all of the currencies traded on the platform. Holders of the Cryptoshare may also participate in the long run vision and decision making of the company itself through democratic voting in a proof-of-stake system. This replicates the dividend payments and shareholder voting of traditional companies, with the added benefits of blockchain technology and decentralisation.

Author: crevbi
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: P2P, Past and Future: Why Is the World’s Most Innovative Cryptocurrency Exchange Using Humanity’s First Ever Trading System?    Exchanging value with other individuals was a critical milestone in the human evolution and the way our ancestors first began to interact with each other.  Collaborating with groups in the earliest tribes meant specializing roles and social contracts – some people hunted and gathered whilst others nurtured new generations.  The mutual benefit was implicit and enforced by social norms.  But what if you wanted to interact with someone outside your regular group? Some kind of exchange of value was needed: “you give us half that elk carcass, and we’ll share our cave through the coming storm. Win-win”. No central authority mediated the exchange, the benefits were clear and immediate, and nothing else was needed. No AML, trusted transactions, or records being kept – although some of the earliest written communications in history do appear to have been ledgers of some kind, maybe writing evolved to support P2P exchanges.  In fact, it’s not just humans who understand this, many species can also understand the value of P2P transacting – learning to perform tasks for researchers in exchange for rewards like food.  Higher primates can be taught to use tokens of exchange too, to understand ‘money’ – from which they rapidly progress to depressingly human-like behaviors from hoarding and theft to protection rackets and prostitution. Currencies and centralization may lead inevitably to corruption – but we must never forget that P2P came first.  And if the cryptocurrency movement is to recover its original intentions of trustlessness, this what we need to get back to.  LocalCoinSwap understands this, and have built their platform around the P2P experience:  “P2P platforms started to disrupt the financial sector over a decade ago”, explains Thomas Underwood, LocalCoinSwap Chief Technical Officer, “with the emergency of lending tools like Zopa and Affirm, enabling investors to connect directly with potential borrowers.  In the dawn of the ‘sharing economy’, people who cared about P2P talked a lot about their ability to cut out banks as middlemen, for the brokerage of credit. Nowadays we have similar services like Transferwise for the exchange of fiat currencies, matching buyers and sellers in different markets.”  “But in reality, these services are still highly centralized, because they depend on third party maintenance of a central ledger, and need to be underpinned by huge amounts of escrow funding.  As such, the main players in each market tended to quickly apply for banking licenses – modeling themselves on the very industries they were supposed to be disrupting”.  By exploiting fundamental qualities of blockchain technology, however, LocalCoinSwap has been able to create a true P2P trading platform without the need for centralized control:  “What the immutable blockchain ledger brings to accounting is truly a revolution on a par with the invention of double-entry bookkeeping. This is the 21st Century Renaissance!” Thomas continues enthusiastically. “Instead of needing a third party to reconcile the separate records based on each party’s transaction receipts, buyers and sellers can write their transactions directly into a joint blockchain register, immediately creating an incorruptible system of enduring accounting record.”  “And using ERC20-based smart contracts to fix the deal up-front, that means funds can be disbursed accurately and immediately according to fixed contractual rules, creating a genuinely peer-to-peer environment for buying and selling cryptocurrencies. “  “But because the peers interacting on the platform are more than just a bunch of private keys, we’re providing a comprehensive set of human community building tools as well – profiles, ratings, and reviews, will all help establish both trust and interactivity, and create a true marketplace, of individuals, trading with each other directly without hierarchy or third party control – that’s what P2P is all about at its heart”.  Of course, P2P exchanges already exist in crypto, but one of the stand-out unique selling points for LocalCoinSwap is the sheer scope. P2P at scale, accepting any fiat currency as a point of entry and planning to launch with the top 10 cryptos on-board for immediate exchange, and a growing number of new launches to be added.  “We extend the P2P philosophy beyond that of our community of traders, it includes those innovating in the space to offer ICOs and new products”, Thomas concludes. “We’ll invite carefully-vetted new token launches to trade on our platform, where they can incentivize our traders – who are platform shareholders in any case – by offering them airdrops of their tokens. That way we’ll support emergent startups, reward our LCS Cryptoshare investors, and continue to encourage new ideas and participants into the marketplace. We’re taking P2P to a whole new level”.  Intrigued? You should be. You can find out more by joining the presale on March 15th – and in the meantime, you stay in touch with the team directly on Telegram, Facebook, Twitter and register on the Website. Author: redlay
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LocalCoinSwap (LCS) is a decentralised marketplace which allows buyers and sellers to trade directly in any cryptocurrency using any method of payment. LocalCoinSwap provides a safe, uncomplicated and fast peer-to-peer (P2P) trading platform, allowing users to freely exchange without unnecessary verification requirements or waiting times. The platform utilises a secure escrow system that solves the inherent trust issues of online P2P trading.

These issues will include new-venture projects, new coins added to the exchange, design considerations, and more. Cryptoshare holders may submit questions to be voted on through the platform’s integrated community forum.

Author: Artemsv
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: Business isn’t usually about being democratic. But then, LocalCoinSwap isn’t about business as usual...  Some might say the cryptocurrency industry is pretty innovative and forward-thinking already, but we felt it was time for some specific additional disruption. Despite the newness of the industry some structures are definitely ripe for an overhaul, and as the innovation cycle escalates in speed, it’s amazing how quickly institutions and power become entrenched, even in the most forward-looking of sectors - and in our opinion, that’s exactly what the problem is with most cryptocurrency exchanges.  Being truly decentralised means distributing the governance as well. So that’s what led us to our unique LocalCoinSwap Cryptoshares model for decision-making.  Of course it’s quite a departure from typical practice, to put the future of the enterprise into the hands of the community in this way, even before we’ve launched. But we believe in our users, in the integrity and collective wisdom of those already engaging with our project - especially our active Telegram users, who are continually challenging us to refine our thinking and make our product better and better. This ongoing conversation has made LocalCoinSwap what it is today, and is part of our agile process for updating and developing over the lifetime of our roadmap. Whilst our team are naturally brilliant, they are necessarily limited in number. Our users however scale that insight, and by leveraging their input and power of selection we can continue to iterate towards the perfect set of tools for everyone.  https://blog.localcoinswap.com/ultimate-democracy-how-owning-part-of-the-exchange-empowers-every-user-and-might-one-day-change-the-way-the-world-is-run/

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: A full-time dedicated security team has been enlisted to safeguard all vulnerable information at all times. 95% of cryptocurrency deposits will be stored in offline wallets to minimise potential loss due to hacking. Regular security audits by penetration specialists have been scheduled to ensure the security system is fully up to date. In addition, third party monitoring systems have been implemented for all servers with automatic shutdown mechanisms in cases of detected intrusion.

Body: Centralised cryptocurrency exchanges in their current form are fraught with inefficiencies, security risks, long wait times and unreasonable verification requirements. This results in high barriers to entry for a huge number of potential users. Commonplace also are unethical business practices including insider trading, front running, and deceptive pricing.

The innovative distributed ownership model offered by LCS Cryptoshares will bridge this gap in the market, while delivering the profits of the platform back into the hands of its users. Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LocalCoinSwap (LCS) is a decentralised marketplace which allows buyers and sellers to trade directly in any cryptocurrency using any method of payment. LocalCoinSwap provides a safe, uncomplicated and fast peer-to-peer (P2P) trading platform, allowing users to freely exchange without unnecessary verification requirements or waiting times. The platform utilises a secure escrow system that solves the inherent trust issues of online P2P trading.

Author: kolinko
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: LocalCoinSwap is holding a crowdsale event of LCS Cryptoshares. Cryptoshares are a digital asset which will be used to facilitate distribution of all profits made by the LocalCoinSwap platform, in addition to all profits made by new business ventures under the LocalCoinSwap umbrella. Cryptoshare holders will additionally receive airdrops of new ICO tokens listed on the LocalCoinSwap platform.

Author: kolinko
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: What advantages do you have for your partners, what I mean is the bonuses for the investors.

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: The platform implements a novel approach to traditional company ownership by utilising blockchain technology to distribute the entirety of the sites profits to holders of LCS Cryptoshares. This asset entitles investors to regular dividend payments denominated in all of the currencies traded on the platform. Holders of the Cryptoshare may also participate in the long run vision and decision making of the company itself through democratic voting in a proof-of-stake system. This replicates the dividend payments and shareholder voting of traditional companies, with the added benefits of blockchain technology and decentralisation.

Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: Our original ICO website was just set up by our back-end developers to host our whitepaper. We have now had a front end team develop a better ICO site with more information on it. Have a look and let us know what you think!  Quote from: mine777 on February 26, 2018, 04:10:28 PM Quote from: imginy on February 26, 2018, 03:57:35 PM Quote from: mine777 on February 26, 2018, 03:33:54 PM Guys, who can answer the question about the bounty campaign? Where can I find it? You can read all the information about the campaign bounty in this thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3009721.0 Thank you, I unfortunately could not find a link to this in the announcement, it would be nice if the manager added information about this, so that every time you do not ask about it here.  We will update the ANN post with a link to the Bounty thread. Great idea!  Quote from: Sovietaced on February 26, 2018, 04:13:06 PM So what exactly do we have? Is it a service that allows users to exchange money between each other or what?  We are allowing users of the LocalCoinSwap platform to safely and securely buy and sell cryptocurrencies from each other. We provide an escrow service and traders may use any payment method they wish.   Quote from: imginy on February 26, 2018, 04:13:49 PM Quote from: mine777 on February 26, 2018, 04:10:28 PM Quote from: imginy on February 26, 2018, 03:57:35 PM Quote from: mine777 on February 26, 2018, 03:33:54 PM Guys, who can answer the question about the bounty campaign? Where can I find it? You can read all the information about the campaign bounty in this thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3009721.0 Thank you, I unfortunately could not find a link to this in the announcement, it would be nice if the manager added information about this, so that every time you do not ask about it here. I think the team listens to this and corrects it, do not worry.  We are always happy to answer any questions the community may have and we listen to what the community wants!  Quote from: NeedsMoreJPEG on February 26, 2018, 04:18:03 PM I'm more concerned with the issue of localization. Will the project be localized to languages other than English. I mean white paper or a website.  We already have a the whitepaper translated into Mandarin and part of our bounty campaign will be more language translations.   Quote from: Brushan on February 26, 2018, 04:49:50 PM The sale of tokens has already started or not yet? How long will this last?  The Pre-ICO is live and the public pre-sale starts March 15. The main ICO will run for 2 months or till hardcap is reached.   Quote from: Tobius on February 26, 2018, 05:16:50 PM Quote from: Brushan on February 26, 2018, 05:08:34 PM Quote from: Tobius on February 26, 2018, 04:59:04 PM Quote from: Brushan on February 26, 2018, 04:49:50 PM The sale of tokens has already started or not yet? How long will this last? As far as I understand, pre-sale will start only after 16 days and for now you can register on the site in order not to miss the start of sales. But I thought that now the whole stage of the pre-ICO? What exactly did they mean by this? I think it meant exactly the preparation for the beginning of the token sale, the promotion of the project and advertising to attract the attention of future investors.  The pre-ICO is a private funding round designed for pooling groups and larger investors. If you would like to be involved just email team@localcoinswap.com   Quote from: masternode on February 26, 2018, 05:17:13 PM Quote from: LocalCoinSwap on February 26, 2018, 03:35:00 PM Quote from: dixon98 on February 26, 2018, 08:47:59 AM Is this going to be like another decentralised crypto exchange, such as IDEX, Etherdelta and Forkdelta?  Hi Dixon98,  We are the first exchange to decentralize 100% of the profits, not just the platform itself. We look forward to working together with the community to change the crypto-economy.  The goal is to only decentralize profits or are you also going to build your exchange based on decentralized technology?  In currencies where it is possible we are implementing multi-signature transactions to decentralise the trading. However this is not possible with all cryptocurrencies.  Quote from: Brushan on February 26, 2018, 05:24:40 PM Quote from: Tobius on February 26, 2018, 05:16:50 PM Quote from: Brushan on February 26, 2018, 05:08:34 PM Quote from: Tobius on February 26, 2018, 04:59:04 PM Quote from: Brushan on February 26, 2018, 04:49:50 PM The sale of tokens has already started or not yet? How long will this last? As far as I understand, pre-sale will start only after 16 days and for now you can register on the site in order not to miss the start of sales. But I thought that now the whole stage of the pre-ICO? What exactly did they mean by this? I think it meant exactly the preparation for the beginning of the token sale, the promotion of the project and advertising to attract the attention of future investors. Well, yes, it sounds logical. Simply usually pre-ICO means the early sale of tokens  Yes the pre-ICO is the private early sale of tokens round that comes before the pre-sale

Author: LocalCoinSwap
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: Hi Skovbitcoin,  Our project is about disrupting the giant monopolies which currently dominate cryptocurrency markets. Many projects seek to disrupt traditional industries, and this is a positive step. However, we believe that cryptocurrency itself is also in need of disruption.  It is antithetical to the concept of decentralization to have so much wealth congregating in the hands of a small number of exchange owners.  We want to break this model and decentralize the profits of the exchange itself, delivering them back to the community.  I hope you will join us on this journey and look forward to exciting developments to come!  Thanks.

Author: LocalCoinSwap
Title: [ANN][ICO] LocalCoinSwap ✦All Profits Distributed ✦All Cryptos ✦Token Airdrops
Body: WHITE PAPER ______________________________________________________________________ WEBSITE | TELEGRAM | MEDIUM | FACEBOOK | TWITTER | LINKEDIN | STEEMIT | REDDIT ______________________________________________________________________  Sign Up for Updates About the Crowdsale    PRESALE BEGINS 15TH MARCH (40% BONUS) - NEW ICO WEBSITE LAUNCHES 23RD FEBRUARY  Join BOUNTY campaign  More cryptocurrencies, more payment methods     Cryptocurrency markets are currently filled with giant monopolies. These massive exchanges are run by small groups of rich elites who take all of the profits. They don’t let any of us share in the success, or decide how they should be run. They make fortunes from our trades and all we get in return are invasive verification procedures, delayed signups, and restricted withdrawals.  To make matters worse, existing peer-to-peer marketplaces are even more exclusive than centralized exchanges. They typically trade only a single cryptocurrency, have badly designed interfaces, and are not community-friendly with helpful support.  We are going to change that! LocalCoinSwap is the world’s most inclusive cryptocurrency marketplace, which decentralizes the most important part of the exchange: the profits. We will support more cryptocurrencies than any other peer-to-peer exchange, and we will support more payment methods than any other peer-to-peer exchange. We will allow traders in any location, to directly trade any cryptocurrency, using any method of payment.  But most importantly: the LocalCoinSwap user base receives 100% of the profits from the marketplace, and votes together in a proof-of-stake system to decide how the exchange should operate.  LocalCoinSwap is an exchange created for the community, owned by the community. Join the revolution!      “Not just another exchange. Not just another ICO.”  Community-focused - Dedicated support team, integrated social media features  Community-owned - 100% of profits distributed to users through the blockchain  Democratically operated - Exchange run through voting in a proof-of-stake system  World’s most inclusive exchange - Instant signup, no verification & no restrictions  Complete transparency - Public financial announcements, open-source contract code  Extensive coin coverage - More cryptocurrencies than any other peer-to-peer exchange  Cutting-edge security - Multi-signature transactions. 95% of funds in cold-storage  Intrinsic token utility - Dividend profits in multiple currencies. Airdrops of new ICO tokens      Token code     LCS Price per LCS 0.0004 ETH ( 1 ETH = 2500 LCS ) LCS maximum total supply 100,000,000 Available through pre-ICO/presale/ICO 70,000,000 Token freeze 20,000,000 Token burn All unsold Payment currencies ETH, BTC, USDT, BCH, XRP, USD, EUR, GBP, AUD, NZD, CAD & more Soft cap 500,000 USD Hard cap 20,000,000 USD (remaining tokens destroyed) Bonus structure Community-based Transparency Open source (public Github)   LCS Cryptoshares are not like traditional ICO tokens. Instead of a vague promise of possible future returns or idealistic visions which may never eventuate into product, Cryptoshares entitle the holders to guaranteed rights to 100% of the total profits from the Localcoinswap exchange, through cryptocurrency dividends.  Portfolio income stream  Cryptocurrency profits are paid to holders in the same cryptocurrencies in which they are made, allowing the investor to receive a regular stream of portfolio income. By holding a single Cryptoshare asset, the investor is entitled to a wide variety of cryptocurrency profits across the entire spectrum of the digital economy.  Free participation in new ICOs  Cryptoshare holders are also entitled to receive airdrops of new tokens when ICO’s are listed on the LocalCoinSwap platform.  Voting rights  Cryptoshares entitle the holder to voting rights in the platform’s decision making process, such as the listing of new tokens on the exchange, the direction of new business ventures and design considerations or functionalities for the platform. Cryptoshares in LocalCoinSwap are more than just a stream of dividends, by joining us you become an integral part of the future of the exchange itself.   Read our whitepaper for detailed information on the LocalCoinSwap project!  Update:  Hello everybody! LocalCoinSwap stays in touch! As you all know our ICO is already going on and very successfully. We have already collected more than 2.9 million dollars and while this is a good result, we want to achieve greater heights to create the best p2p-exchange on the market. Therefore, we want to launch a marketing campaign in markets where we are not available yet - Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Spanish and Chinese. Therefore, we are looking for people who will develop our project in these markets and grow with the company. If you are responsible, initiative taking, you know English well and are ready to represent our project, write Valeri in telegram @KnowledgeBroker or send an e-mail to val@localcoinswap.com    __________________________________________________________________________ To get in touch with the team directly, email us: community@localcoinswap.com
